SEARCH
Package JavaFiles

Class UpdateSystem

java.lang.Object
JavaFiles.UpdateSystem
public class UpdateSystem extends Object
The UpdateSystem class manages scheduled updates based on specific calendar dates and conditions. These updates include payroll and payslips generation, clearing claims, and scale updates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UpdateSystem(String dateEntered)
    Constructs an UpdateSystem instance with a specified date.

  • Constructor Details

    • UpdateSystem

      public UpdateSystem(String dateEntered)
      Constructs an UpdateSystem instance with a specified date. If the date format is invalid, the current system date is used instead.
      Parameters:
      dateEntered - The date provided by the user in "yyyy-MM-dd" format.

  • Method Details

    • updateAll

      public void updateAll()
      Triggers all scheduled updates based on the current date and run count assuming the program is run everyday. Operations include: -Clears payroll and generates new payroll on the second Friday of every month. - Clearing pay claims on the 25th of each month. - Generating payslips on the 25th of each month. - Promoting employees on October 25th and increase pay scale point by one.

    • addEmployeeToSystem

      public void addEmployeeToSystem(String userID)
      Adds an employee to the payroll system. - Full-time employees are always added. - Part-time employees are added only if they have pay claims.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the employee to add.

    • isUserInPayRoll

      public boolean isUserInPayRoll(String userID)
      Checks if an employee is in the payroll system.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the employee to check.
      Returns:
      true if the employee is in the payroll system, false otherwise.
